price: Dize: "A ciência está, apenas, junto de Allah e sou, apenas, evidente admoestador."
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡعِلۡمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā al-ʿil'mu ʿinda al-lahi wa-innamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
